monumentInformation.title: Mutianyu Section
details: A scenic and well-preserved part of the wall.

monumentInformation.title: Badaling Section
details: The most accessible and popular section.

monumentInformation.title: Jiankou Section
details: A rugged, adventurous stretch of the wall.

monumentInformation.title: Jinshanling Section
details: Known for its breathtaking views and tranquility.

monumentInformation.title: Gubeikou Section
details: A historic part with original bricks.

monumentInformation.title: Simatai Section
details: A beautiful part offering night tours.

monumentInformation.title: The Great Wall Museum
details: Located at Badaling, showcasing the wall's history and significance.
